duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate the monthly client billing cycle and resolve revisions to proformas in a timely manner
Monitor WIP by ensuring regular communication with attorneys regarding aged balances
Assist in ad-hoc requests and projects, ensuring deadlines and projects are completed
Demonstrate a high level of business acumen and professionalism when working with internal and external clients at all levels
Maintain documentation on client-related procedures, deadlines, and billing attorney preferences

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Accounting, or Finance preferred (or equivalent accounting experience and education if no Bachelor’s Degree)
